Name: hin-suhelfarooqkhan-la
Author: Suhel Farooq Khan And Saifur Rahman Nadwi

Translations.Text: aur jo log (qayaamat mein) hamaaree huzooree kee ummeed nahin rakhate kaha karate hain ki aakhir pharishte hamaare paas kyon nahin naazil kie gae ya ham apane paravaradigaar ko (kyon nahin) dekhate un logon ne apane jee mein apane ko (bahut) bada samajh liya hai aur badee sarakashee kee
jis din ye log pharishton ko dekhenge us din gunaah gaaron ko kuchh khushee na hogee aur pharishton ko dekhakar kahenge door daphaan
aur un logon ne (duniya mein) jo kuchh nek kaam kie hain ham usakee taraph tavajjon karengen to ham usako (goya) udatee huee khaak banaakar (barabaad kar) degen
us din jannat vaalon ka thikaana bhee behatar hai behatar hoga aur aaramagaah bhee achchhee se achchhee
aur jis din aasamaan badalee ke sabab se phat jaega aur pharishte kasarat se (jook dar zook) naazil kie jaenge
use din kee saltanal khaas khuda hee ke lie hogee aur vah din kaaphiron par bada sakht hoga
aur jis din julm karane vaala apane haath (maare afasos ke) kaatane lagega aur kahega kaash rasool ke saath main bhee (deen ka seedha) raasta pakadata
hae aphasos kaash mai phala shakhs ko apana dost na banaata
beshak yaqeenan usane hamaare paas naseehat aane ke baad mujhe bahakaaya aur shaitaan to aadamee ko rusava karane vaala hee hai
aur (us vakt) rasool (baaragaahe khuda vandee mein) arz karegen ki ai mere paravaradigaar meree qaum ne to is quraan ko bekaar bana diya
aur hamane (goya khud) gunaahagaaron mein se har nabee ke dushman bana die hain aur tumhaara paravaradigaar hidaayat aur madadagaaree ke lie kaaphee hai

aur kuphphaar kahane lage ki unake oopar (aakhir) quraan ka kul (ek hee dapha) kyon nahin naazil kiya gaya (hamane) is tarah isalie (naazil kiya) taaki tumhaare dil ko taskeen dete rahen aur hamane isako thahar thahar kar naazil kiya
aur (ye kuphphaar) chaahe kaisee hee (anokhee) masal bayaan karenge magar ham tumhaare paas (unaka) bilkul theek aur nihaayat umda (javaab) bayaan kar degen
jo log (qayaamat ke din) apane apane mohasinon ke bal jahannum mein hakae jaegen vahee log badatar jagah mein hogen aur sab se jyaada raah raast se bhatakane vaale
aur alabatta hamane moosa ko kitaab (taurait) ata kee aur unake saath unake bhaee haarun ko (unaka) vazeer banaaya
to hamane kaha tum donon un logon ke paas ja jo hamaaree (kudarat kee) nishaaniyon ko jhuthalaate hain jao (aur samajhao jab na maane) to hamane unhen khoob barabaad kar daala

aur nooh kee qaum ko jab un logon ne (hamaare) paigambaron ko jhuthalaaya to hamane unhen dubo diya aur hamane unako logon (ke hairat) kee nishaanee banaaya aur hamane zaalimon ke vaaste dardanaak azaab taiyaar kar rakha hai
aur (isee tarah) aad aur samood aur nahar vaalon aur unake daramiyaan mein bahut see jamaaton ko (hamane halaak kar daala)
aur hamane har ek se misaalen bayaan kar dee theen aur (khoob samajhaaya) magar na maana

hamane unako khoob satyaanaas kar chhoda aur ye log (kuphfaare makka) us bastee par (ho) aae hain jis par (pattharon kee) buree baarish barasaee gayee to kya un logon ne isako dekha na hoga magar (baat ye hai ki) ye log marane ke baad jee uthane kee ummeed nahin rakhate (phir kyon eemaan laen)
aur (ai rasool) ye log tumhen jab dekhate hain to tum se masakhara pan hee karane lagate hain ki kya yahee vah (hazarat) hain jinhen allaah ne rasool banaakar bheja hai (maaz allaah)

agar buton kee parasatish par saabit qadam na rahate to is shakhs ne hamako hamaare maaboodon se bahaka diya tha aur bahut jald (qayaamat mein) jab ye log azaab ko dekhengen to unhen maaloom ho jaega ki raahe raast se kaun jyaada bhataka hua tha
kya tumane us shakhs ko bhee dekha hai jisane apanee nafasiyaanee khvaahish ko apana maabood bana rakha hai to kya tum usake zimmedaar ho sakate ho (ki vah gumaraah na hon)
kya ye tumhaara khyaal hai ki in (kuphfaaron) mein aksar (baat) sunate ya samajhate hai (nahin) ye to bas bilkul misal jaanavaron ke hain balki un se bhee jyaada raah (raast) se bhatake hue

(ai rasool) kya tumane apane paravaradigaar kee kudarat kee taraph nazar nahin kee ki usane kyonkar saaye ko phaila diya agar vah chahata to use (ek hee jagah) thahara hua kar deta phir hamane aaphataab ko (usakee shinaakht ke vaaste) usaka rahanuma bana diya
phir hamane usako thoda thoda karake apanee taraph kheech liya
aur vahee to vah (khuda) hai jisane tumhaare vaaste raat ko parda banaaya aur neend ko raahat aur din ko (kaarobaar ke lie) uth khada hone ka vakt banaaya

aur vahee to vah (khuda) hai jisane apanee rahamat (baarish) ke aage aage havaon ko khush khabaree dene ke lie (pesh khema bana ke) bheja aur ham hee ne aasamaan se bahut paak aur suthara hua paanee barasaaya
taaki ham usake zarie se murda (veeraan) shahar ko zinda (aabaad) kar den aur apanee makhalookaat mein se chaupaayon aur bahut se aadamiyon ko usase seraab karen
aur hamane paanee ko unake daramiyaan (tarah tarah se) taqaseem kiya taaki log naseehat haasil karen magar aksar logon ne naashukree ke siva kuchh na maana
aur agar ham chaahate to har bastee mein zarur ek (azaabe khuda se) daraane vaala paigambar bhejate
(to ai rasool) tum kaaphiron kee itaat na karana aur unase kuraan ke (dalael) se khoob ladon

aur vahee to vah (khuda) hai jisane darayaon ko aapas mein mila diya (aur baavajood ki) ye khaalis mazedaar meetha hai aur ye bilkul khaaree kadava (magar donon ko milaaya) aur donon ke daramiyaan ek aad aur mazaboot ot bana dee hai (ki gadabad na ho)
aur vahee to vah (khuda) hai jisane paanee (manee) se aadamee ko paida kiya phir usako khaanadaan aur susaraal vaala banaaya aur (ai rasool) tumhaara paravaradigaar har cheez par qaadir hai

aur log (kuphfaare makka) khuda ko chhodakar us cheez kee parasatish karate hain jo na unhen napha hee de sakatee hai aur na nuqasaan hee pahuncha sakatee hai aur kaaphir (aboojahal) to har vakt apane paravaradigaar kee mukhaalephat par zor lagae hue hai
aur (ai rasool) hamane to tumako bas (nekee ko jannat kee) khushakhabaree dene vaala aur (buron ko azaab se) daraane vaala banaakar bheja hai
aur un logon se tum kah do ki mai is (tabaleege risaalat) par tumase kuchh mazadooree to maangata nahin hoon magar tamanna ye hai ki jo chaahe apane paravaradigaar tak pahunchane kee raah pakade

aur (ai rasool) tum us (khuda) par bharosa rakho jo aisa zinda hai ki kabhee nahin marega aur usakee hamd va sana kee tasbeeh padho aur vah apane bandon ke gunaahon kee vaaqiph kaaree mein kaaphee hai (vah khud samajh lega)

jisane saare aasamaan va zameen aur jo kuchh un donon mein hai chhah: din mein paida kiya phir arsh (ke banaane) par aamaada hua aur vah bada meharabaan hai to tum usaka haal kisee baakhabar hee se poochhana

aur jab un kuphphaaron se kaha jaata hai ki rahamaan (khuda) ko sajada karo to kahate hain ki rahamaan kya cheez hai tum jisake lie kahate ho ham us ka sajada karane lagen aur (isase) unakee napharat aur badh jaatee hai (60) sajada
bahut baabarakat hai vah khuda jisane aasamaan mein burj banae aur un burjon mein (aafataab ka) chiraag aur jagamagaata chaand banaaya
aur vahee to vah (khuda) hai jisane raat aur din (ek) ko (ek ka) jaanasheen banaaya (ye) us ke (samajhane ke) lie hai jo naseehat haasil karana chaahe ya shukr guzaaree ka iraada karen
aur (khudae) rahamaan ke khaas bande to vah hain jo zameen par phirautanee ke saath chalate hain aur jab jaahil unase (jihaalat) kee baat karate hain to kahate hain ki salaam (tum salaamat raho)
aur vah log jo apane paravaradigaar ke vaaste sazade aur qayaam mein raat kaat dete hain
aur vah log jo dua karate hain ki paravaradigaara ham se jahannum ka azaab phere rahana kyonki usaka azaab bahut (sakht aur paedaar hoga)
beshak vah bahut bura thikaana aur bura maqaam hai
aur vah log ki jab kharch karate hain to na phuzool kharchee karate hain aur na tangee karate hain aur unaka kharch usake darameyaan ausat darje ka rahata hai

aur vah log jo khuda ke saath doosare maaboodon kee parasatish nahee karate aur jis jaan ke maarane ko khuda ne haraam kar diya hai use naahaq qatl nahin karate aur na zina karate hain aur jo shakhs aisa karega vah aap apane gunaah kee saza bhugatega
ki qayaamat ke din usake lie azaab doona kar diya jaega aur usamen hamesha zaleel va khavaar rahega

magar (haan) jis shakhs ne tauba kee aur eemaan qubool kiya aur achchhe achchhe kaam kie to (alabatta) un logon kee buraiyon ko khuda nekiyon se badal dega aur khuda to bada bakhshane vaala meharabaan hai
aur jis shakhs ne tauba kar lee aur achchhe achchhe kaam kie to beshak usane khuda kee taraph (sachche dil se) haqeekaqatan ruju kee
aur vah log jo phareb ke paas hee nahee khade hote aur vah log jab kisee behooda kaam ke paas se guzarate hain to burzugaana andaaz se guzar jaate hain
aur vah log ki jab unhen unake paravaradigaar kee aayaten yaad dilaee jaatee hain to bahare andhen hokar gir nahin padate balki jee lagaakar sunate hain
aur vah log jo (hamase) arz karate hain ki paravaradigaar hamen hamaaree beebiyon aur aulaadon kee taraph se onkhon kee thandak ata pharama aur hamako parahezagaaron ka peshava bana
ye vah log hain jinhen unakee jaza mein (behasht ke) baala khaane ata kie jaengen aur vahaan unhen taazeem va salaam (ka badala) pesh kiya jaega
ye log usee mein hamesha rahengen aur vah rahane aur thaharane kee achchhee jagah hai

(ai rasool) tum kah do ki agar dua nahee kiya karate to mera paravaradigaar bhee tumhaaree kuchh paravaah nahee karata tumane to (usake rasool ko) jhuthalaaya to an qareeb hee (usaka vabaal) tumhaare sar padega
ta seen meem
ye vaazee va raushan kitaab kee aayaten hai
(ai rasool) shaayad tum (is phikr mein) apanee jaan halaak kar daaloge ki ye (kuphphaar) momin kyo nahin ho jaate
agar ham chaahen to un logon par aasamaan se koee aisa maujiza naazil karen ki un logon kee gardanen usake saamane jhuk jaen
aur (logon ka qaayada hai ki) jab unake paas koee koee naseehat kee baat khuda kee taraph se aayee to ye log usase munh phere bagair nahin rahe
un logon ne jhuthalaaya zarur to anaqareeb hee (unhen) is (azaab) kee haqeekat maaloom ho jaegee jisakee ye log hansee udaaya karate the
kya in logon ne zameen kee taraph bhee (gaur se) nahin dekha ki hamane har rang kee umda umda cheejen usamen kis kasarat se ugaayee hain
yaqeenan isamen (bhee qudarat) khuda kee ek badee nishaanee hai magar unamen se aksar eemaan laane vaale hee nahin
aur isamen shak nahin ki tera paravaradigaar yaqeenan (har cheez par) gaalib (aur) meharabaan hai
(ai rasool vah vakt yaad karo) jab tumhaare paravaradigaar ne moosa ko aavaaz dee ki (in) zaalimon phiraun kee qaum ke paas jao (hidaayat karo)
kya ye log (mere gazab se) darate nahin hai
moosa ne arz ki paravaradigaar main darata hoon ki (mubaada) vah log mujhe jhuthala de
aur (unake jhuthalaane se) mera dam ruk jae aur meree zabaan (achchhee tarah) na chale to haarun ke paas paigaam bhej de (ki mera saath de)
(aur isake alaava) unaka mere sar ek jurm bhee hai (ki maine ek shakhs ko maar daala tha)
to main darata hoon ki (shaayad) mujhe ye laag maar daalen khuda ne kaha haragiz nahin achchha tum donon hamaaree nishaaniyaan lekar jao ham tumhaare saath hain
aur (saaree guphtagoo) achchhee tarah sunate hain garaz tum donon phiraun ke paas jao aur kah do ki ham saare jahaann ke paravaradigaar ke rasool hain (aur paigaam laen hain)
ki aap banee isarail ko hamaare saath bhej deejie
(chunaanche moosa gae aur kaha) phiraun bola (moosa) kya hamane tumhen yahaan rakh kar bachapane mein tumhaaree paravarish nahin kee aur tum apanee umr se barason ham me rah sah chuke ho
aur tum apana vah kaam (khoon qibtee) jo kar gae aur tum (bade) naashukre ho
moosa ne kaha (haan) maine us vakt us kaam ko kiya jab mai haalate gaphalat mein tha
phir jab mai aap logon se dara to bhaag khada hua phir (kuchh arase ke baad) mere paravaradigaar ne mujhe nuboovat ata pharamaayee aur mujhe bhee ek paigambar banaaya
aur ye bhee koee ehasaan he jise aap mujh par jata rahe hai ki aap ne banee isaraeel ko gulaam bana rakha hai
phiraun ne poochha (achchha ye to batao) rabbul aalameen kya cheez hai
moosa ne kahaan saare aasamaan va zameen ka aur jo kuchh in donon ke daramiyaan hai (sabaka) maalik agar aap log yaqeen keejie (to kaaphee hai)
phiraun ne un logo se jo usake ird gird (baithe) the kaha kya tum log nahin sunate ho
moosa ne kaha (vahee khuda jo ki) tumhaara paravaradigaar aur tumhaare baap daadaon ka paravaradigaar hai
phiraun ne kaha (logon) ye rasool jo tumhaare paas bheja gaya hai ho na ho deevaana hai
moosa ne kaha (vah khuda jo) poorab pashchim aur jo kuchh in donon ke daramiyaan (sabaka) maalik hai agar tum samajhate ho (to yahee kaaphee hai)
phiraun ne kaha agar tum mere siva kisee aur ko (apana) khuda banaaya hai to mai zarur tumhe kaidee banaoonga
moosa ne kaha agarache main aapako ek vaajee va raushan maujiza bhee dikhaoo (to bhee)
phiraun ne kaha (achchha) to tum agar (apane daave mein) sachche ho to la dikhao
bas (ye sunate hee) moosa ne apanee chhadee (zameen par) daal dee phir to yakaayak vah ek sareehee azadaha ban gaya
aur (jeb se) apana haath baahar nikaala to yakaayak dekhane vaalon ke vaaste bahut saphed chamakadaar tha
(is par) phiraun apane darabaariyon se jo usake gird (baithe) the kahane laga
ki ye to yaqeenee bada khilaadee jaadoogar hai ye to chaahata hai ki apane jaadoo ke zor se tumhen tumhaare mulk se baahar nikaal de to tum log kya hukm lagaate ho
darabaariyon ne kaha abhee isako aur isake bhaee ko (chand) mohalat deejie
aur tamaam shaharon mein jaadoogaron ke jama karane ko harakaare ravaana keejie ki vah log tamaam bade bade khilaadee jaadoogaron kee aapake saamane la haazir karen
garaz vakte mukarrar hua sab jaadoogar us muqarrar ke vaayade par jama kie gae
aur logon mein munaadee kara dee gayee ki tum log ab bhee jama hoge
ya nahin taaki agar jaadoogar gaalib aur var hai to ham log unakee pairavee karen
alagaraj jab sab jaadoogar aa gaye to jaadoogaron ne phiraun se kaha ki agar ham gaalib aa gae to hamako yaqeenan kuchh inaam (sarakaar se) milega
phiraun ne kaha ha (zarur milega) aur (inaam kya cheez hai) tum us vakt (mere) mukararebeen (baaragaah) se ho gae
moosa ne jaadoogaron se kaha (mantr va tantr) jo kuchh tumhen phenkana ho phenko
is par jaadoogaron ne apanee rassiyaan aur apanee chhadiyaan (maidaan mein) daal dee aur kahane lage phiraun ke jalaal kee qasam ham hee zarur gaalib rahenge
tab moosa ne apanee chhadee daalee to jaadoogaron ne jo kuchh (shobade) banae the usako vah nigalane lagee
ye dekhate hee jaadoogar log sajade mein (moosa ke saamane) gir pade
aur kahane lage ham saare jahaan ke paravaradigaar par eemaan lae
jo moosa aur haarun ka paravaradigaar hai

phiraun ne kaha (hae) qabl isake ki mai tumhen ijaazat doon tum is par eemaan le aae beshak ye tumhaara bada (guru hai jisane tum sabako jaadoo sikhaaya hai to khair) abhee tum logon ko (isaka nateeja) maaloom ho jaega ki ham yaqeenan tumhaare ek taraph ke haath aur doosaree taraph ke paanv kaat daalegen aur tum sab ke sab ko soolee degen
vah bole kuchh paravaah nahee hamako to baharahaal apane paravaradigaar kee taraph laut kar jaana hai
ham chanki sabase pahale eemaan lae hai isalie ye ummeed rakhate hain ki hamaara paravaradigaar hamaaree khataen maaph kar dega
aur hamane moosa ke paas vahee bhejee ki tum mere bandon ko lekar raaton raat nikal jao kyonki tumhaara peechha kiya jaega
tab phiraun ne (lashkar jama karane ke khyaal se) tamaam shaharon mein (dhada dhad) harakaare ravaana kie
(aur kaha) ki ye log moosa ke saath banee isarail thodee see (mutthee bhar kee) jamaat hain
aur un logon ne hamen sakht gussa dilaaya hai
aur ham sabake sab ba saazon saamaan hain
tum bhee aa jao ki sab milakar taakakub (peechha) karen
garaz hamane in logon ko (misr ke) baagon aur chashmon aur khazaanon aur ijzat kee jagah se (yoon) nikaal baahar kiya
(aur jo naapharamaanee kare) isee tarah saza hogee aur aakhir hamane unheen cheezon ka maalik banee isarail ko banaaya
garaz (moosa) to raat hee ko chale gae
aur un logon ne sooraj nikalate unaka peechha kiya to jab donon jamaaten (itanee kareeb huyeen ki) ek doosare ko dekhane lagee to moosa ke saathee (hairaan hokar) kahane lage
ki ab to pakade gae moosa ne kaha haragiz nahin kyonki mere saath mera paravaradigaar hai

vah phauran mujhe koee (mukhalisee ka) raasta bata dega to hamane moosa ke paas vahee bhejee ki apanee chhadee dariya par maaro (maarana tha ki) phauran dariya phut ke tukade tukade ho gaya to goya har tukada ek bada ooncha pahaad tha
aur hamane usee jagah doosare phareek (phiraun ke saathee) ko qareeb kar diya
aur moosa aur usake saathiyon ko hamane (doobane se) bacha liya
phir doosare phareeq (phiraun aur usake saathiyon) ko dubokar halaaq kar diya
beshak isamen yaqeenan ek badee ibarat hai aur unamen aksar eemaan laane vaale hee na the
aur isamen to shak hee na tha ki tumhaara paravaradigaar yaqeenan (sab par) gaalib aur bada meharabaan hai
aur (ai rasool) un logon ke saamane ibaraaheem ka kissa bayaan karon
jab unhonne apane (munh bole) baap aur apanee qaum se kaha
ki tum log kisakee ibaadat karate ho to vah bole ham buton kee ibaadat karate hain aur unheen ke mujaavir ban jaate hain
ibaraaheem ne kaha bhala jab tum log unhen pukaarate ho to vah tumhaaree kuchh sunate hain
ya tamhen kuchh napha ya nuqasaan pahuncha sakate hain
kahane lage (ki ye sab to kuchh nahin) balki hamane apane baap daadaon ko aisa hee karate paaya hai
ibaraaheem ne kaha kya tumane dekha bhee ki jin cheezon keee tum parasatish karate ho
ya tumhaare agale baap daada (karate the) ye sab mere yaqeenee dushman hain
magar saare jahaan ka paalane vaala jisane mujhe paida kiya (vahee mera dost hai)
phir vahee meree hidaayat karata hai
aur vah shakhs jo mujhe (khaana) khilaata hai aur mujhe (paanee) pilaata hai
aur jab beemaar padata hoon to vahee mujhe shipha inaayat pharamaata hai
aur vah vahee heai jo mujhe maar daalega aur usake baad (phir) mujhe zinda karega
aur vah vahee hai jisase mai ummeed rakhata hoon ki qayaamat ke din meree khataon ko bakhsh dega
paravaradigaar mujhe ilm va phaham ata pharama aur mujhe nekon ke saath shaamil kar
aur aainda aane vaalee naslon mein mera zikre khair qaayam rakh
aur mujhe bhee neamat ke baag (behasht) ke vaarison mein se bana
aur mere (munh bole) baap (chacha aazar) ko bakhsh de kyonki vah gumaraahon mein se hai
aur jis din log qabron se uthae jaengen mujhe rusava na karana
jis din na to maal hee kuchh kaam aaega aur na ladake baale
magar jo shakhs khuda ke saamane (gunaahon se) paak dil lie hue haazir hoga (vah phaayade mein rahega)
aur behasht parahez gaaron ke qareeb kar dee jaegee
aur dozakh gumaraahon ke saamane zaahir kar dee jaegee
aur un logon (ahale jahannum) se poochha jaega ki khuda ko chhodakar jinakee tum parasatish karate the (aaj) vah kahaan hain
kya vah tumhaaree kuchh madad kar sakate hain ya vah khud apanee aap baaham madad kar sakate hain
phir vah (maabood) aur gumaraah log aur shaitaan ka lashakar
(garaz sabake sab) jahannum mein audhen munh dhakel die jaenge
aur ye log jahannum mein baaham jhagada karenge aur apane maabood se kahenge
khuda kee qasam ham log to yaqeenan sareehee gumaraahee mein the
ki ham tum ko saare jahaann ke paalane vaale (khuda) ke baraabar samajhate rahe
aur hamako bas (un) gunaahagaaron ne (jo mujhase pahale hue) gumaraah kiya
to ab to na koee (saahab) meree siphaarish karane vaale hain
aur na koee dilaband dost hain
to kaash hamen ab duniya mein dobaara jaane ka mauqa milata to ham (zarur) eemaan vaalon se hote
ibaraaheem ke is kisse mein bhee yaqeenan ek badee ibarat hai aur inamen se aksar eemaan laane vaale the bhee nahin
aur isame to shak hee nahin ki tumhaara paravaradigaar (sab par) gaalib aur bada meharabaan hai
(yoon hee) nooh kee qaum ne paigambaro ko jhuthalaaya
ki jab unase un ke bhaee nooh ne kaha ki tum log (khuda se) kyon nahin darate mai to tumhaara yaqeenee amaanat daar paigambar hoon
tum khuda se daro aur meree itaat karo
aur main is (tabaleege risaalat) par kuchh ujarat to maangata nahin
meree ujarat to bas saare jahaan ke paalane vaale khuda par hai
to khuda se daro aur meree itaat karo vah log bole jab kameeno mazadooron vagairah ne (laalach se) tumhaaree pairavee kar lee hai
to ham tum par kya eemaan laen
nooh ne kaha ye log jo kuchh karate the mujhe kya khabar (aur kya garaz)
in logon ka hisaab to mere paravaradigaar ke zimme hai
kaash tum (itanee) samajh rakhate aur mai to eemaanadaaron ko apane paas se nikaalane vaala nahin
mai to sirph (azaabe khuda se) saaph saaph daraane vaala hoon
vah log kahane lage ai nooh agar tum apanee harakat se baaz na aaoge to zarur sangasaar kar die jaoge
nooh ne arj kee paravaradigaar meree qaum ne yaqeenan mujhe jhuthalaaya
to ab too mere aur in logon ke daramiyaan ek qatee phaisala kar de aur mujhe aur jo momineen mere saath hen unako najaat de
garaz hamane nooh aur unake saathiyon ko jo bharee huee kashtee mein the najaat dee
phir usake baad hamane baaqee logon ko garak kar diya
beshak isame bhee yaqeenan badee ibarat hai aur unamen se bahutere eemaan laane vaale hee na the
aur isamen to shak hee nahin ki tumhaara paravaradigaar (sab par) gaalib meharabaan hai
(isee tarah qaum) aad ne paigambaron ko jhuthalaaya
jab unake bhaee hood ne unase kaha ki tum khuda se kyon nahee darate
main to yaqeenan tumhaara amaanatadaar paigambar hoon
to khuda se daro aur meree itaat karo
mai to tum se is (tabaleege risaalat) par kuchh mazadooree bhee nahin maangata meree ujarat to bas saaree khudaayee ke paalane vaale (khuda) par hai
to kya tum oonchee jagah par bekaar yaadagaare banaate phirate ho
aur bade bade mahal taameer karate ho goya tum hamesha (yaheen) rahoge
aur jab tum (kisee par) haath daalate ho to sarakashee se haath daalate ho
to tum khuda se daro aur meree itaat karo
aur us shakhs se daro jisane tumhaaree un cheezon se madad kee jinhen tum khoob jaanate ho
achchha suno usane tumhaare chaar paayon aur ladake baalon vagairah aur chashmon se madad kee
mai to yaqeenan tum par
ek bade (sakht) roz ke azaab se darata hoon
vah log kahane lage khvaah tum naseehat karo ya na naseehat karo hamaare vaaste (sab) baraabar hai
ye (daraava) to bas agale logon kee aadat hai
haalaanki ham par azaab (vagairah ab) kiya nahin jaega
garaz un logon ne hood ko jhuthala diya to hamane bhee unako halaak kar daala beshak is vaaqiye mein yaqeenee ek badee ibarat hai aar unamen se bahutere eemaan laane vaale bhee na the
aur isamen shak nahin ki tumhaara paravaradigaar yaqeenan (sab par) gaalib (aur) bada meharabaan hai
(isee tarah qaum) samood ne paigambaron ko jhuthalaaya
jab unake bhaee saaleh ne unase kaha ki tum (khuda se) kyo nahin darate
main to yaqeenan tumhaara amaanatadaar paigambar hoon
to khuda se daro aur meree itaat karo
aur mai to tumase is (tabaleege risaalat) par kuchh mazadooree bhee nahin maangata- meree mazadooree to bas saaree khudaee ke paalane vaale (khuda par hai)
kya jo cheejen yahaan (duniya mein) maujood hai
baag aur chashmen aur khetiya aur chhuhaare jinakee kaliyaan lateef va naazuk hotee hai
unheen me tum log itaminaan se (hamesha ke lie) chhod die jaoge
aur (is vajah se) pooree mahaarat aur takaleeph ke saath pahaadon ko kaat kaat kar ghar banaate ho
to khuda se daro aur meree itaat karo
aur jyaadatee karane vaalon ka kaha na maanon
jo rue zameen par fasaad phailaaya karate hain aur (kharaabiyon kee) isalaah nahin karate
vah log bole ki tum par to bas jaadoo kar diya gaya hai (ki aisee baaten karate ho)
tum bhee to aakhir hamaare hee aise aadamee ho pas agar tum sachche ho to koee maujiza hamaare paas la (dikhao)
saaleh ne kaha- yahee oontanee (maujiza) hai ek baaree isake paanee peene kee hai aur ek muqarrar din tumhaare peene ka
aur isako koee takaleef na pahunchaana varana ek bade (sakht) zor ka azaab tumhe le daalega
is par bhee un logon ne usake paanv kaat daale aur (usako maar daala) phir khud pashemaan hue
phir unhen azaab ne le daala-beshak isamen yaqeenan ek badee ibarat hai aur inamen ke bahutere eemaan laane vaale bhee na the
aur isamen shak hee nahin ki tumhaara paravaradigaar (sab par) gaalib aur meharabaan hai
isee tarah loot kee qaum ne paigambaron ko jhuthalaaya
jab unake bhaee loot ne unase kaha ki tum (khuda se) kyon nahin darate
mai to yaqeenan tumhaara amaanatadaar paigambar hoon to khuda se daro
aur meree itaat karo
aur mai to tumase is (tabaleege risaalat) par kuchh mazadooree bhee nahin maangata meree mazadooree to bas saaree khudaayee ke paalane vaale (khuda) par hai
kya tum log (shahavat parastee ke lie) saare jahaan ke logon mein mardon hee ke paas jaate ho
aur tumhaare vaaste jo beeviyaan tumhaare paravaradigaar ne paida kee hai unhen chhod dete ho (ye kuchh nahin) balki tum log had se guzar jaane vaale aadamee ho
un logon ne kaha ai loot agar tum baaz na aaoge to tum zarur nikal baahar kar die jaoge
loot ne kaha mai yaqeenan tumhaaree (naashaisata) harakat se bezaar hoon
(aur dua kee) paravaradigaar jo kuchh ye log karate hai usase mujhe aur mere ladakon ko najaat de
to hamane unako aur unake sab ladakon ko najaat dee
magar (loot kee) boodhee aurat ki vah peechhe rah gayee
(aur halaak ho gayee) phir hamane un logon ko halaak kar daala
aur un par hamane (pattharon ka) menh barasaaya to jin logon ko (azaabe khuda se) daraaya gaya tha
un par kya badee baarish huee is vaaqiye mein bhee ek badee ibarat hai aur inamen se bahutere eemaan laane vaale hee na the
aur isame to shak hee nahin ki tumhaara paravaradigaar yaqeenan sab par gaalib (aur) bada meharabaan hai
isee tarah jangal ke rahane vaalon ne (mere) paigambaron ko jhuthalaaya
jab shueb ne unase kaha ki tum (khuda se) kyon nahin darate
mai to bila shubaah tumhaara amaanadaar hoon
to khuda se daro aur meree itaat karo
mai to tumase is (tabaleege risaalat) par kuchh mazadooree bhee nahin maangata meree mazadooree to bas saaree khudaee ke paalane vaale (khuda) ke zimme hai
tum (jab koee cheez naap kar do to) poora paimaana diya karo aur nuqasaan (kam dene vaale) na bano
aur tum (jab taulo to) theek taraazoo se dandee seedhee rakhakar taulo
aur logon ko unakee cheeze (jo khareeden) kam na jyaada karo aur zameen se phasaad na phailaate phiro
aur us (khuda) se daro jisane tumhe aur agalee khilakat ko paida kiya
vah log kahane lage tum par to bas jaadoo kar diya gaya hai (ki aisee baaten karate hon)
aur tum to hamaare hee aise ek aadamee ho aur ham log to tumako jhootha hee samajhate hain
to agar tum sachche ho to ham par aasamaan ka ek tukada gira do
aur shueb ne kaha jo tum log karate ho mera paravaradigaar khoob jaanata hai
garaz un logon ne shueb ko jhuthalaaya to unhen saebaan (abr) ke azaab ne le daala- isame shak nahin ki ye bhee ek bade (sakht) din ka azaab tha
isame bhee shak nahin ki isamen (samajhadaaron ke lie) ek badee ibarat hai aur unamen ke bahutere eemaan laane vaale hee na the
aur beshak tumhaara paravaradigaar yaqeenan (sab par) gaalib (aur) bada meharabaan hai
aur (ai rasool) beshak ye (quraan) saaree khudaayee ke paalane vaale (khuda) ka utaara hua hai
jise ruhul ameen (jibareel) saaf arabee zabaan mein lekar tumhaare dil par naazil hue hai
taaki tum bhee aur paigambaron kee tarah
logon ko azaabe khuda se darao
aur beshak isakee khabar agale paigambaron kee kitaabon me (bhee maujood) hai
kya unake lie ye koee (kaafee) nishaanee nahin hai ki isako ulema banee isarail jaanate hain
aur agar ham is quraan ko kisee doosaree zabaan vaale par naazil karate
aur vah un arabo ke saamane usako padhata to bhee ye log us par eemaan laane vaale na the
isee tarah hamane (goya khud) is inkaar ko gunaahagaaron ke dilon mein raah dee
ye log jab tak dardanaak azaab ko na dekh legen us par eemaan na laenge
ki vah yakaayak is haalat mein un par aa padega ki unhen khabar bhee na hogee
(magar jab azaab naazil hoga) to vah log kahenge ki kya hamen (is vakt quchh) mohalat mil sakatee hai
to kya ye log hamaare azaab kee jaldee kar rahe hain
to kya tumane gaur kiya ki agar ham unako saalo saal chain karane de
usake baad jis (azaab) ka unase vaayada kiya jaata hai unake paas aa pahunche
to jin cheezon se ye log chain kiya karate the kuchh bhee kaam na aaengee
aur hamane kisee bastee ko bagair usake halaaq nahin kiya ki usake samajhaane ko (pahale se) daraane vaale (paigambar bhej die) the
aur ham zaalim nahin hai
aur is quraan ko shayaateen lekar naazil nahee hue
aur ye kaam na to unake lie munaasib tha aur na vah kar sakate the
balki vah to (vahee ke) sunane se maharum hain
(ai rasool) tum khuda ke saath kisee doosare maabood kee ibaadat na karo varana tum bhee mubatilae azaab kie jaoge
aur (ai rasool) tum apane qareebee rishtedaaron ko (azaabe khuda se) darao
aur jo momineen tumhaare pairo ho gae hain unake saamane apana baajoo jhukao
(to vaazee karo) pas agar log tumhaaree naafaramaanee karen to tum (saaph saaph) kah do ki main tumhaare karatooton se baree uz zimma hoon
aur tum us (khuda) par jo sabase (gaalib aur) meharabaan hai
bharosa rakho ki jab tum (namaaje tahajjud mein) khade hote ho
aur sajada
karane vaalon (kee jamaat) mein tumhaara phirana (uthana baithana sajada rukoou vagairah sab) dekhata hai
beshak vah bada sunane vaala vaaqifakaar hai kya mai tumhen bata doon ki shayaateen kin logon par naazil hua karate hain
(lo suno) ye log jhoothe bad kiradaar par naazil hua karate hain
jo (farishton kee baaton par kaan lagae rahate hain) ki kuchh sun paen
haalaanki unamen ke aksar to (bilkul) jhoothe hain aur shaayaron kee pairavee to gumaraah log kiya karate hain
kya tum nahin dekhate ki ye log jangal jangal saragirado maare maare phirate hain
aur ye log aisee baate kahate hain jo kabhee karate nahin

magar (haan) jin logon ne eemaan qubool kiya aur achchhe achchhe kaam kie aur qasarat se khuda ka zikr kiya karate hain aur jab un par zulm kiya ja chuka usake baad unhonnen badala liya aur jin logon ne zulm kiya hai unhen anaqareeb hee maaloom ho jaega ki vah kis jagah lautae jaengen
ta seen ye quraan vaajee va raushan kitaab kee aayaten hai
(ye) un eemaanadaaron ke lie (azasarataapa) hidaayat aur (jannat kee) khushakhabaree hai
jo namaaz ko paabandee se ada karate hain aur zakaat diya karate hain aur yahee log aakhirat (qayaamat) ka bhee yaqeen rakhate hain
isamen shak nahin ki jo log aakhirat par eemaan nahin rakhate (goya) hamane khud (unakee kaarastaaniyon ko unakee nazar mein) achchha kar dikhaaya hai
to ye log bhatakate phirate hain- yahee vah log hain jinake lie (qayaamat mein) bada azaab hai aur yahee log aakhirat mein sabase jyaada ghaata uthaane vaale hain
aur (ai rasool) tumako to quraan ek bade vaaqiphakaar hakeem kee baaragaah se ata kiya jaata hai

(vah vaaqiya yaad dilao) jab moosa ne apane ladake baalon se kaha ki maine (apanee baayeen taraph) aag dekhee hai (ek zara thaharo to) mai vahaan se kuchh (raah kee) khabar laanoo ya tumhen ek sulagata hua aag ka angaara la doon taaki tum taapo
garaz jab moosa is aag ke paas aae to unako aavaaz aayee ki mubaarak hai vah jo aag mein (tajallee dikhaana) hai aur jo usake gird hai aur vah khuda saare jahaan ka paalane vaala hai
(har aib se) paak va paakeeza hai- ai moosa isamen shak nahin ki mai zabaradast hikamat vaala hoon

aur (haan) apanee chhadee to (zameen par) daal do to jab moosa ne usako dekha ki vah is tarah lahara rahee hai goya vah jinda azadaha hai to pichhale paavan bhaag chale aur peechhe mudakar bhee na dekha (to hamane kaha) ai moosa daro nahin hamaare paas paigambar log dara nahin karate hain
(mutamin ho jaate hai) magar jo shakhs gunaah kare phir gunaah ke baad use nekee (tauba) se badal de to alabatta bada bakhshane vaala meharabaan hoon

(vahaan) aur apana haath apane garebo mein to daalo ki vah saphed burraaq hokar beaib nikal aaega (ye vah maujize) min jumala nau mojizaat ke hain jo tumako milegen tum phiraun aur usakee qaum ke paas (jao) kyonki vah badakiradaar log hain
to jab unake paas hamaare onkhen khol dene vaale maijize aae to kahane lage ye to khula hua jaadoo hai
aur baavajood ke unake dil ko un maujizaat ka yaqeen tha magar phir bhee un logon ne sarakashee aur takabbur se unako na maana to (ai rasool) dekho ki (aakhir) muphasidon ka anjaam kya hoga
aur isamen shak nahin ki hamane daood aur sulemaan ko ilm ata kiya aur donon ne (khush hokar) kaha khuda ka shukr jisane hamako apane bahutere eemaanadaar bandon par phazeelat dee

aur (ilm hikamat jaedaad (manakoola) gair manakoola sab mein) sulemaan daood ke vaaris hue aur kaha ki log ham ko (khuda ke phazal se) parindon kee bolee bhee sikhaayee gayee hai aur hamen (duniya kee) har cheez ata kee gayee hai isamen shak nahin ki ye yaqeenee (khuda ka) sareehee phazal va karam hai
aur sulemaan ke saamane unake lashakar jinnaat aur aadamee aur parinde sab jama kie jaate the

to vah sabake sab (masal masal) khade qie jaate the (garaz is tarah lashakar chalata) yahaan tak ki jab (ek din) cheeteeyon ke maidaan mein aa nikale to ek cheeteen bolee ai cheeteeyon apane apane bil mein ghus jao- aisa na ho ki sulemaan aur unaka lashkar tumhe raund daale aur unhen usakee khabar bhee na ho

to sulemaan is baat se muskura ke hans paden aur arj qee paravaradigaar mujhe taupheeq ata pharama ki jaisee jaisee neamaten toone mujh par aur mere vaaladain par naazil pharamaee hain mai (unaka) shukriya ada karun aur main aise nek kaam karun jise too pasand pharamae aur too apanee khaas meharabaanee se mujhe (apane) nekokaar bandon mein daakhil kar
aur sulemaan ne parindon (ke lashkar) kee haaziree lee to kahane lage ki kya baat hai ki mai hudahud ko (usakee jagah par) nahin dekhata kya (vaaqee mein) vah kahee gaayab hai
(agar aisa hai to) mai use sakht se sakht saza doonga ya (nahin to ) use zabaah hee kar daaloonga ya vah (apanee begunaahee kee) koee saaph daleel mere paas pesh kare

garaz sulemaan ne thodee hee der (tavakkuf kiya tha ki (hudahud) aa gaya) to usane arz kee mujhe yah baat maaloom huee hai jo ab tak huzoor ko bhee maaloom nahin hai aur aap ke paas shahare saba se ek tahaqeekee khabar lekar aaya hoon
maine ek aurat ko dekha jo vahaan ke logon par salatanat karatee hai aur use (duniya kee) har cheez ata kee gayee hai aur usaka ek bada takht hai

maine khud malaka ko dekha aur usakee qaum ko dekha ki vah log khuda ko chhodakar aaphataab ko sajada karate hain shaitaan ne unakee karatooton ko (unakee nazar mein) achchha kar dikhaaya hai aur unako raahe raast se rok rakha hai

to unhen (itanee see baat bhee nahin soojhatee) ki vah log khuda hee ka sajada kyon nahin karate jo aasamaan aur zameen kee posheeda baaton ko zaahir kar deta hai aur tum log jo kuchh chhipaakar ya zaahir karake karate ho sab jaanata hai
allaah vah hai jisase siva koee maabood nahin vahee (itane) bade arsh ka maalik hai (sajada)
(garaz) sulemaan ne kaha ham abhee dekhate hain ki toone sach sach kaha ya too jhootha hai
(achchha) hamaara ye khat lekar ja aur usako un logon ke saamane daal de phir un ke paas se jaana phir dekhate rahana ki vah log akhir kya javaab dete hain
(garaz) hud hud ne malaka ke paas khat pahuncha diya to malaka bolee ai (mere darabaar ke) saradaaron ye ek vaajibul ehataraam khat mere paas daal diya gaya hai
sulemaan kee taraph se hai (ye usaka saranaama) hai bismillaahirarahamaaniraheem
(aur mazamoon) yah hai ki mujh se sarakashee na karo aur mere saamane pharamaabaradaar ban kar haazir ho

tab malaka (vilaqees) bolee ai mere darabaar ke saradaaron tum mere is maamale mein mujhe raay do (kyonki mera to ye qaayada hai ki) jab tak tum log mere saamane maujood na ho (mashavara na de do) main kisee amr mein qatee phaisala na kiya karatee
un logon ne arz kee ham bade zoraavar bade ladane vaale hain aur (aainda) har amr ka aap ko ekhtiyaar hai to jo hukm de aap (khud achchhee) tarah isake anjaam par gaur kar le

malaka ne kaha baadashaahon ka qaayada hai ki jab kisee bastee mein (bazore fateh) daakhil ho jaate hain to usako ujaad dete hain aur vahaan ke muaziz logon ko zaleel va rusava kar dete hain aur ye log bhee aisa hee karenge
aur main unake paas (elachiyon kee maarafat kuchh tohapha bhejakar dekhatee hoon ki elachee log kya javaab laate hain) garaz jab bilaqees ka elachee (tohapha lekar) sulemaan ke paas aaya

to sulemaan ne kaha kya tum log mujhe maal kee madad dete ho to khuda ne jo (maal duniya) mujhe ata kiya hai vah (maal) usase jo tumhen bakhsha hai kaheen behatar hai (main to nahee) balki tumhee log apane tohaphe tahaayaf se khush hua karo

(phir tohapha laane vaale ne kaha) to unheen logon ke paas ja ham yaqeenan aise lashkar se un par chadhaee karenge jisaka usase muqaabala na ho sakega aur ham zarur unhen vahaan se zaleel va rusava karake nikaal baahar karenge
(jab vah ja chuka) to sulemaan ne apane ahale darabaar se kaha ai mere darabaar ke saradaaro tumamen se kaun aisa hai ki qabl isake vah log mere saamane pharamaabaradaar banakar aayen

malika ka takht mere paas le aae (is par) jinon mein se ek diyo bol utha ki qabl isake ki huzoor (darabaar barakhaast karake) apanee jagah se uthe mai takht aapake paas le aaoonga aur yaqeenan us par qaaboo rakhata hoon (aur) zimmedaar hoon

is par abhee sulemaan kuchh kahane na pae the ki vah shakhs (aasif bin barakhiya) jisake paas kitaabe (khuda) ka kis kadar ilm tha bola ki mai aap kee palak jhapakane se pahale takht ko aap ke paas haazir kie deta hoon (bas itane hee mein aa gaya) to jab sulemaan ne use apane paas maujood paaya to kahane lage ye mahaz mere paravaradigaar ka phazal va karam hai taaki vah mera imtehaan le ki mai usaka shukr karata hoon ya naashukree karata hoon aur jo koee shukr karata hai vah apanee hee bhalaee ke lie shukr karata hai aur jo shakhs na shukree karata hai to (yaad rakhie) mera paravaradigaar yaqeenan beparava aur sakhee hai

(usake baad) sulemaan ne kaha ki usake takht mein (usakee akl ke imtihaan ke lie) tagayyur tabadadul kar do taaki ham dekhen ki phir bhee vah samajh rakhatee hai ya un logon mein hai jo kuchh samajh nahin rakhate

(chunaanche aisa hee kiya gaya) phir jab bilaqees (sulemaan ke paas) aayee to poochha gaya ki tumhaara takht bhee aisa hee hai vah bolee goya ye vahee hai (phir kahane lagee) hamako to usase pahale hee (aapakee nuboovat) maaloom ho gayee thee aur ham to aapake faramaabaradaar the hee
aur khuda ke siva jise vah poojatee thee sulemaan ne usase use rok diya kyonki vah kaaphir qaum kee thee (aur aaphataab ko poojatee thee)

phir usase kaha gaya ki aap ab mahal me chalie to jab usane mahal (mein sheeshe ke pharsh) ko dekha to usako gahara paanee samajhee (aur guzarane ke lie is tarah apane paeche utha lie ki) apanee donon pindaliyaan khol dee sulemaan ne kaha (tum daro nahin) ye (paanee nahin hai) mahal hai jo sheeshe se madha hua hai (us vakt tambeeh huee aur) arz kee paravaradigaar maine (aaphataab ko pooja kar) yaqeenan apane oopar zulm kiya

aur ab main sulemaan ke saath saare jahaan ke paalane vaale khuda par eemaan laatee hoon aur ham hee ne qaum samood ke paas unake bhaee saaleh ko paigambar banaakar bheja ki tum log khuda kee ibaadat karo to vah saaleh ke aate hee (momin va kaaphir) do phareeq banakar baaham jhagadane lage

saaleh ne kaha ai meree qaum (aakhir) tum log bhalaee se pahal buraee ke vaaste jaldee kyon kar rahe ho tum log khuda kee baaragaah mein tauba va astagaphaar kyon nahee karate taaki tum par raham kiya jae
vah log bole hamane to tum se aur tumhaare saathiyon se bura shagun paaya saaleh ne kaha tumhaaree badakismatee khuda ke paas hai (ye sab kuchh nahin) balki tum logon kee aazamaish kee ja rahee hai
aur shahar mein nau aadamee the jo mulk ke baaneeye phasaad the aur isalaah kee phikr na karate the-un logon ne (aapas mein) kaha ki baaham khuda kee qasam khaate jao

ki ham log saaleh aur usake ladake baalo par shab khoon kare usake baad usake vaalee vaaris se kah degen ki ham log unake ghar vaalon ko halaaq hote vakt maujood hee na the aur ham log to yaqeenan sachche hain
aur un logon ne ek tadabeer kee aur hamane bhee ek tadabeer kee aur (hamaaree tadabeer kee) unako khabar bhee na huee
to (ai rasool) tum dekho unakee tadabeer ka kya (bura) anjaam hua ki hamane unako aur saaree qaum ko halaak kar daala
ye bas unake ghar hain ki unakee naapharamaaniyon kee vazah se khaalee veeraan pade hain isame shak nahee ki us vaaqiye mein vaaqiph kaar logon ke lie badee ibarat hai
aur hamane un logon ko jo eemaan lae the aur parahezagaar the bacha liya
aur (ai rasool) loot ko (yaad karo) jab unhonne apanee qaum se kaha ki kya tum dekhabhaal kar (samajh boojh kar) aisee behayaee karate ho
kya tum auraton ko chhodakar shahavat se mardon ke aate ho (ye tum achchha nahin karate) balki tum log badee jaahil qaum ho to loot kee qaum ka isake siva kuchh javaab na tha
